Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AccessKey.description: Optional. The access key is used if credentials are required to access the self-managed object storage server.
AccessKey.markdownDescription:
Optional. The access key is used if credentials are required to access the self-managed object storage server.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 200  
Pattern: ^.+$  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentArns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the agents associated with the self-managed object storage server location.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:agent/agent-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentArns.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the agents associated with the self-managed object storage server location.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

BucketName.description: The name of the bucket on the self-managed object storage server.
BucketName.markdownDescription:
The name of the bucket on the self-managed object storage server.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-\+\./\(\)\$\p{Zs}]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

SecretKey.description: Optional. The secret key is used if credentials are required to access the self-managed object storage server.
SecretKey.markdownDescription:
Optional. The secret key is used if credentials are required to access the self-managed object storage server.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 8  
Maximum Length: 200  
Pattern: ^.+$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerCertificate.description: X.509 PEM content containing a certificate authority or chain to trust.
ServerCertificate.markdownDescription:
X.509 PEM content containing a certificate authority or chain to trust.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 32768  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerHostname.description: The name of the self-managed object storage server. This value is the IP address or Domain Name Service (DNS) name of the object storage server.
ServerHostname.markdownDescription:
The name of the self-managed object storage server. This value is the IP address or Domain Name Service (DNS) name of the object storage server.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]*[a-zA-Z0-9])\.)*([A-Za-z0-9\-]*[A-Za-z0-9])$  
Update requires: Replacement

ServerPort.description: The port that your self-managed server accepts inbound network traffic on.
ServerPort.markdownDescription:
The port that your self-managed server accepts inbound network traffic on.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerProtocol.description: The protocol that the object storage server uses to communicate.
ServerProtocol.markdownDescription:
The protocol that the object storage server uses to communicate.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: HTTPS | HTTP  
Update requires: No interruption

Subdirectory.description: The subdirectory in the self-managed object storage server that is used to read data from.
Subdirectory.markdownDescription:
The subdirectory in the self-managed object storage server that is used to read data from.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4096  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-\+\./\(\)\p{Zs}]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the location that is created.
LocationArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the location that is created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:location/loc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationUri.description: The URL of the object storage location that was described.
LocationUri.markdownDescription:
The URL of the object storage location that was described.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4356  
Pattern: ^(efs|nfs|s3|smb|fsxw|object-storage)://[a-zA-Z0-9./\-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
